Name: Unarmored Defense
Description: Can use their wisdom modifier to calculate AC while not wearing armor.

Name: Martial Arts
Description: Can use their unarmed strikes to deal damage and can use certain monk weapons.

Name: Ki
Description: Can use ki points to fuel certain abilities and gain resistance to certain damage types.

Name: Monastic Tradition
Description: Choose a Monastic Tradition that grants additional abilities and options.

Name: Ability Score Improvement
Description: Can increase one ability score by 2 or two ability scores by 1.

Name: Slow Fall
Description: Can use their reaction to reduce falling damage.

Name: Extra Attack
Description: Can attack twice, instead of once, whenever they take the Attack action on their turn.

Name: Stunning Strike
Description: Can spend ki points to stun a creature on a hit.

Name: Ki-Empowered Strikes
Description: Unarmed strikes count as magical for the purpose of overcoming resistance and immunity to nonmagical damage.

Name: Evasion
Description: Can use their reaction to halve damage from an area of effect that allows a Dexterity saving throw.

Name: Stillness of Mind
Description: Can use an action to end one effect on themselves that causes charmed or frightened.

Name: Purity of Body
Description: Becomes immune to disease and poison.

Name: Tongue of the Sun and Moon
Description: Can speak and understand any language.
icon: Tongue of the Sun and Moon.png

Name: Diamond Soul
Description: Can spend ki points to gain proficiency in all saving throws.

Name: Timeless Body
Description: No longer suffers aging penalties and cannot be aged magically.

Name: Empty Body
Description: Can use an action to become invisible and immune to all damage for a short period of time.

Name: Perfect Self
Description: Becomes immune to all nonmagical damage and has advantage on saving throws against magical effects.
